basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=6.80 µg/ml), Propioni bacterium acnes (MIC=10.50 µg/ml), Pseudemonas aeruginosa (MIC=14.50 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=16.00 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=6.80 µg/ml), Listeria monocytogene (MIC=9.92 µg/ml).
